feed.title: DeepScan Status
feed.subtitle: This page continuously shows status reports of deepscan.io.

entry.title: Service outage for DB migration
entry.content:
During DB migrations, the service will not be responding. Webhook requests including commits and pull requests will not be processed. No data will be corrupted.

The service is working now. The outage took less than 5 minutes. Thanks.

entry.title: DB Issues
entry.content:
Our Database was responding abnormally. Some DB queries are failed and some webhook requests including commits and pull requests are not processed. No data is corrupted.

2019-07-15T04:14:00.000Z
Resolved

Database is back to normal and system is fully operational.

entry.title: DB Issues
entry.content:
Our Database was responding abnormally. Some DB queries are failed and some webhook requests including commits and pull requests are not processed. No data is corrupted.

2018-03-26T14:30:00.000Z
Resolved

Database is back to normal and system is fully operational.
